Stay hydrated and healthy with our Daily Water Intake Tracker app! Designed to help you maintain optimal hydration levels, this intuitive and user-friendly app is your personal hydration companion.
With this extension you can choose how often you want to be reminded to drink water throughout the day. Set up gentle and motivating notifications to ensure you never miss a hydration break and meet your daily goals.
